security: This document is marked 'FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY,' which indicates that the information contained within is considered sensitive and not for public dissemination. Releasing the specific findings of the local agency checks, even if they reveal no record, could be perceived as a breach of privacy or security protocols. Sharing internal agency processes and the agent's name and organization (ROBERT A MALONEY, 115th INTC Gp ( I )) could potentially expose operational methods and personnel.
summary: This document is an agent report summarizing the findings of local agency checks regarding Robert Scheer, indicating no records were found concerning him in the checked agencies.
summary_one_paragraph: An agent report dated October 7, 1966, details the findings of local agency checks conducted on Robert Scheer by Robert A. Maloney of the 115th INTC Gp (I). The Sheriff's Office of Alameda County, Oakland, California, the Police Department of Oakland, California, and the Police Department of Berkeley, California were checked, and no records were found concerning Robert Scheer or any variations of his name. The report includes Scheer's date of birth, place of birth, and Social Security number, along with the dates on which the agencies' files were checked.
title: [RESTRICTED]
